TAM.description_of_public: The total addressable market includes all motorcycle accessory consumers and dealers globally, including both end customers looking for accessories and retailers selling these products.
TAM.justification: The TAM is derived from the global motorcycle accessory market, which was valued at approximately $15 billion in 2023, with a growth rate of about 5% annually. This includes all potential customers and dealers in this sector. Assumptions were made based on industry growth rates and the increasing number of motorcycle owners worldwide.

industry_example.name: Harley-Davidson
industry_example.description: Harley-Davidson has a robust range of motorcycle accessories targeting both end customers and dealers, successfully leveraging bundled sales to increase their market presence.

SAM.description_of_public: The serviceable available market encompasses those consumers and dealers that BMW can realistically target with its accessory bundles, primarily focusing on BMW motorcycle owners and authorized dealers.
SAM.justification: SAM is estimated to be 30% of the TAM, focusing specifically on BMW motorcycle owners and their authorized dealers. This percentage reflects the brand's established market presence and loyalty among existing customers.

industry_example.name: Ducati
industry_example.description: Ducati offers a range of accessories tailored to its motorcycles, effectively targeting its customer base with bundled solutions, which has led to a significant increase in accessory sales.

SOM.description_of_public: The serviceable obtainable market reflects the portion of the SAM that BMW can realistically capture in the near term, focusing on initial sales of the new accessory bundles.
SOM.justification: SOM is estimated at 20% of the SAM in the initial years, reflecting a conservative market capture strategy as BMW launches its new accessory bundles. This percentage is expected to grow over the years as brand awareness and product availability increase.

industry_example.name: BMW Motorrad
industry_example.description: BMW Motorrad has successfully introduced various accessory packages that cater to specific customer needs, resulting in a solid initial market capture and increased customer engagement.
